title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.14 - Vehicles under 40 miles per hour
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 103.14 - Vehicles under 40 miles per hour

State Regulations

Vehicles equipped with simultaneous flashers shall be
required to use them when traveling on the Thruway at a speed of less than 40
miles per hour, except when posted for less or when the flow of traffic
dictates otherwise. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
103.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
